title: Apple and cranberry pie
ingredients: ['120g dried cranberries', '125g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1kg Cox apples, peeled, cored and thinly sliced', '1 1/2 tablespoons brandy', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 sheets ready-made shortcrust pastry']
